customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
A "big brother" figure must have "cred" with the youngsters. Even Genius Invokation TCG, a leisurely pastime, has become a matter of reputation to be managed as well...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: You will not use your own deck, but a preset deck named "The Ingenious Uses of Mehrak" instead.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Wriothesley
customize.desc:
"Emissary of Solitary Iniquity" Wriothesley

Guilty waters run deep.

customize.name: Thoma
customize.desc:
"Protector From Afar" Thoma

A protector from abroad, loyal to the end.

customize.name: Shenhe
customize.desc:
"Lonesome Transcendence" Shenhe

The mortal realm briefly gracing, like a wisp of smoke vanishing.

customize.name: Kaveh
customize.desc:
"Empyrean Reflection" Kaveh

Knowledge of comprehension, benevolence, and aesthetics.

customize.name: Mona
customize.desc:
"Astral Reflection" Mona

Victory or defeat — it has all been written in the stars.

customize.name: Furina
customize.desc:
"Endless Solo of Solitude" Furina

Perpetual muse of chansons and rondeaux.

customize.name: Tome of the Eternal Flow
customize.desc:
Aeon Wave: Tome of the Eternal Flow

"...For if the harbinger of the apocalypse would indeed one day arrive, the flood would wash everything away."

"The watchers would fight with both duty and joy in their our hearts, just as the goddess had found empathy for them in hers."

customize.name: Tome of the Eternal Flow
customize.desc:

customize.name: Wolf's Gravestone
customize.desc:
Mountain Trail: Wolf's Gravestone

A longsword said to have been used by the knight of the north wind. It became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.

customize.name: Wolf's Gravestone
customize.desc:

customize.name: Paimon
customize.desc:
Paimon, the Best Guide

"That's right! Your fortune is Paimon's fortune! And vice versa, Paimon's fortune is also your fortune."

customize.name: Paimon
customize.desc:
Paimon, the Best Guide

"That's right! Your fortune is Paimon's fortune! And vice versa, Paimon's fortune is also your fortune."

customize.name: Iron Tongue Tian
customize.desc:
"Where We Last Left Off" Iron Tongue Tian

"Listen, I'll tell you how is it… Let me show you real storytelling tradition!”

customize.name: Iron Tongue Tian
customize.desc:
"Where We Last Left Off" Iron Tongue Tian

"Listen, I'll tell you how is it… Let me show you real storytelling tradition!”

customize.name: The Legend of Vennessa
customize.desc:
Dream of Freedom Unrelinquished

"Lonely forest breezes converged, jointly they overthrew the tyrant's tower from the sky."

"Broken free from shackles at last, the young lioness stood firm in the winds with her head held high."

customize.name: The Legend of Vennessa
customize.desc:

customize.name: Rainbow Macarons
customize.desc:
Rainbow Macarons

Small, multicolored little pastries. Their crispy outer shell packages a sweet, soft center, each refined to perfection.
There is a saying in Fontaine that "a dessert spread without macarons is like having the many waters bereft of their source."

customize.name: Rainbow Macarons
customize.desc:

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>
